title: Fear
content:
Fear Level 3 Illusion Spell Project an image so frightening it makes targets drop their weapons and become Fearful. They will be easier to hit and cannot move. If the target ends their turn where they can't see you, they can make another Saving Throw to shake off their fear. 2 turns 1 turn 9m WIS Save Concentration Action Level 3 Spell Slot
